name: R. Henao
body:
### Journals
* J. Vikeså, A. K. H. Møller, B. Kaczkowski, R. Borup, O. Winther, **R. Henao**, A. Krogh, K. Perell, F. Jensen, G. Daugaard, F.~C. Nielsen. Cancers of unknown primary origin (CUP) are characterized by chromosomal instability (CIN) compared to metastasis of know origin. _BMC Cancer_, 15(151), 2015.
* E. L. Tsalik, R. J. Langley, D. L. Dinwiddie, N. A. Miller, B. Yoo, J. C. van Velkinburgh, L. D. Smith, I. Thiffault, A. K. Jaehne, A. M. Valente, **R. Henao**, X. Yuan, S. W. Glickman, B. J. Rice, M. T. McClain, L. Carin, G. R. Corey, G. S. Ginsburg, C. B. Cairns, R. M. Otero, V. G. Fowler, E. P. Rivers, C. W. Woods, S. F. Kingsmore. An integrated transcriptome and expressed variant analysis of sepsis survival and death. _Genome medicine_, 6(11), 2014.
* Q. J. Quinones, Q. Ma, Z. Zhang, **R. Henao**, E. Soderblom, M. A. Moseley, C. Newgard, K. Drew, B. M. Barnes, M. V. Podgoreanu. Proteomic Profiling Reveals Reduction in Electron Transport Chain Proteins in the Hearts of Hibernating Arctic Ground Squirrels Compared with Rats after Surgical Ischemia and Reperfusion: A Convergence of Mammalian Cardio-protective Strategies. _Circulation_, 130(2) 2014.
* Q. J Quinones, Q. Ma, **R. Henao**, J. Lucas, M. L. Riess, J. Bain, C. B. Newgard, B. M. Barnes, M. V. Podgoreanu. Proteomic and Metabolomic Profiling After Ischemia-Reperfusion Injury Reveals Bottlenecks That Underlie Cardioprotection in Hibernating Mammals. _Circulation_, 128(22) 2013.
* A. M. Benjamin, J. W. Thompson, E. J. Soderblom, S. J. Geromanos, **R. Henao**, V. B. Kraus, M. A. Moseley and J.~E. Lucas. A flexible statistical model for alignment of label-free proteomics data – incorporating ion mobility and product ion information. _BMC Bioinformatics_, 14(364) 2013.
* **R. Henao**, J. W. Thompson, M. A. Moseley, G. S. Ginsburg, L. Carin, J. E. Lucas. Latent Protein Trees (2013). _Annals of Applied Statistics_, 7(2) 691--713 2013.
* M. Kurokawa, J. Kim, J. Geradts, K. Matsuura, L. Liu, X. Ran, W. Xia, T. J. Ribar, **R. Henao**, M. W. Dewhirst, W. J. Kim, J. E. Lucas, S. Wang, N. L. Spector, S. Kornbluth, A Network of Substrates of the E3 Ubiquitin Ligases MDM2 and HUWE1 Control Apoptosis Independently of p53. _Science Signaling_. 6(274) ra32 (2013).
* L. Carin, A. Hero III, J. E. Lucas, D. Dunson, M. Chen, **R. Henao**, A. Tibau-Piug, A. Zaas, C. W. Woods and G. S. Ginsburg. High Dimensional Longitudinal Genomic Data: An analysis used for monitoring viral infections. _IEEE Signal Processing Magazine_, 29(1) 108--123, 2012.
* M. Rossing, R. Borup, **R. Henao**, O. Winther, J. Vikesaa, O. Niazi, C. Godballe, A. Krogdahl, M. Glud, C. Hjort-Sørensen, K. Kiss, F. N. Bennedbæk and F. C. Nielsen. Down-regulation of microRNAs controlling tumourigenic factors in follicular thyroid carcinoma. _Journal of Molecular Endocrinology_, 48 11--23, 2011.
* M. Friis, T. Martin-Bertelsen, L. Friis-Hansen, O. Winther, **R. Henao**, M. Sølvsten Sørensen and K. Qvortrup. Gene expression of the endolymphatic sac. _Acta Oto-laryngologica_, 131(12) 1257--1263, 2011.
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Predictive Active Set Selection Methods for Gaussian Processes. _Neurocomputing_, 80 10--18, 2011.
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Sparse linear identifiable multivariate modeling. _Journal of Machine Learning Research_, 12 863--905, 2011.
* R. Borup, M. Rossing, **R. Henao**, Y. Yamamoto, A. Krogdahl, C. Godballe, O. Winther, K. Kiss, L. Christensen, E. Høgdall, F. Bennedbæk and F. C. Nielsen. Molecular signatures of thyroid follicular neoplasia. _Endocrine-Related Cancer_, 17 (3) 691--708, 2010.

### Conferences
* Z. Gan, **R. Henao**, D. Carlson, L. Carin (2015). Learning Deep Sigmoid Belief Networks with Data Augmentation. _The 18th International Conference on 
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics_.
* **R. Henao**, X. Yuan and L. Carin (2009). Bayesian Nonlinear Support Vector Machines and Discriminative Factor Modeling. _Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 27_.
* **R. Henao**, J. Murray, G. Ginsburg, L. Carin and J. E. Lucas (2013). Patient clustering with uncoded text in electronic medical records. _AMIA Annual Symposium Proceedings_.
* **R. Henao**, J. W. Thompson, M. A. Moseley, G. S. Ginsburg, L. Carin, J. E. Lucas. Hierarchical factor modeling of proteomics data (2012). _Computational Advances in Bio and Medical Sciences (ICCABS), 2012 IEEE 2nd International Conference on_.
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther (2010). PASS-GP: Predictive active set selection for Gaussian processes. _Machine Learning for Signal Processing (MLSP), 2010 IEEE International Workshop on_.
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther (2009). Bayesian sparse factor models and DAGs, inference and comparison. _Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 22_.
* M. Alvarez and **R. Henao** (2007). Hidden Markov Bayesian principal component analysis. _Proceedings of the 14-th International Conference on Neural Information Processing_.
* M. Alvarez, **R. Henao** and  A. Orozco (2007). Myocardial ischemia detection using hidden Markov principal component analysis. _IV Latin American Congress on Biomedical Engineering, Bioengineering Solutions for Latin America Health_. IFMBE Proceedings, vol. 18.
* M. Alvarez and **R. Henao** (2006). Probabilistic kernel principal component analysis
through time. _Proceedings of The 13-th International Conference on Neural Information Processing_, Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol. 4232.
* M. Alvarez, **R. Henao** and C. G. Castellanos (2006). Dimensionality reduction of dynamic features using HMMs and latent variable observation models (in spanish). _XI Symposium of Signal Processing, Images and Artificial Vision_ IEEE Signal Processing Society, Colombian Chapter (Best research paper award).
* M. Alvarez, **R. Henao** and C. G. Castellanos, J. I. Godino-Llorente, A. Orozco (2006). Kernel
principal component analysis through time for voice disorder classification. _Proceedings of The 28-th International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology_.
* D. A. Alvarez, **R. Henao**, C. G. Castellanos, J. E. Hurtado and C. L. Rengifo (2004). Active learning on the classification of voice pathologies, _Odyssey 2004: The Speaker and Language Recognition Workshop_. International Speech Communication Association.

### Other
* **R. Henao**, J. Geradts, M. Kurokawa, S. Kornbluth, J. E. Lucas. Automated, Quantitative Analysis of Histopathological Staining in Nuclei. _AMIA Summit on Translational Bioinformatics_. San Francisco, USA, 2013 (poster).
* C. Walder, **R. Henao**, M. Mørup and L.K Hansen. Semi-Supervised Kernel PCA. _arXiv_, 2011 (technical report).
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Robust processes for latent variables in dynamical factor models. _European Workshop on Challenges in Modern Massive Datasets (EMMDS2009)_. Lyngby, Denmark, 2009 (poster).
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Robust processes for latent variables in dynamical factor models. _7th Workshop on Bayesian Nonparametrics (BNP7)_. Torino, Italy, 2009 (poster).
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Learning graphical model structure with sparse Bayesian factor models and process priors. _Sixth Workshop on Bayesian Inference in Stochastic Processes (BISP6)_. Bressanone, Italy, 2009 (poster).
* **R. Henao** and O. Winther. Learning graphical model structure with Bayesian sparse linear factor models. _Sparsity in Machine Learning and Statistics (smls09)_. Cumberland Lodge, UK, 2009 (poster).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
